entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Last Mountain Lake (Sanctuary)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Last Mountain 03:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
